DOCNAME: CASE OF FARAGÓ AND OTHERS v. HUNGARY
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE , DATE and DATE , respectively .
CARDINAL . On DATE the second applicant gave birth to a boy , the first applicant . In DATE the latter was diagnosed with cerebral atrophy .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicants lodged a medical liability action against the hospital where the first applicant was born .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Pest Central District Court partly found for the applicants and ordered the respondent to pay them respectively MONEY ( ORG ) ( MONEY ( ORG ) ) , ORG CARDINAL ( approximately EUR CARDINAL ) and HUF CARDINAL ( approximately EUR CARDINAL ) and accrued interests . The respondent appealed .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG , acting as a second - instance court , gave judgment , upholding the first - instance decision .
CARDINAL . On DATE a written copy of the decision was served on the applicants’ lawyer .
